{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04395v1", "title": "A refined $q$-analogue of some congruences of Van Hamme", "summary": "In 1997, Van Hamme proposed 13 supercongruences corresponding to $1/\pi$
series of the Ramanujan-type. Inspired by the recent work of V.J.W. Guo, we
establish a unified $q$-analogue of Van Hamme's (B.2), (E.2) and (F.2)
supercongruences, which is also a refinement of some known results obtained by
different authors. As a consequence, we give a parametric supercongruence
related to the Euler polynomials.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT,math.CO", "published": "2025-05-07T13:19:14Z"}
